[@log-right/base](./base.md) &gt; [Event\_2](./base.event_2.md)

## Event\_2 interface

Data used to identify a specific system event

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Event extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [context?](./base.event_2.context.md) | unknown | <i>(Optional)</i> A free-format field that will be added to all IEvent objects (to be used in custom logic added by the user). |
|  [details?](./base.event_2.details.md) | string &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> A string that includes additional information about the event |
|  [id](./base.event_2.id.md) | string | A unique string that can be used to identify the event |
|  [message](./base.event_2.message.md) | string | A message string to be used in logging and display components associated the event |
|  [severity](./base.event_2.severity.md) | [Severity](./base.severity.md) | Determines the severity level of the event (a number 0 through 10). This field is used to determine how the system should respond to an event |
|  [source?](./base.event_2.source.md) | string &#124; null | <i>(Optional)</i> A string representing the source that initiated the event |
|  [type](./base.event_2.type.md) | [EventType](./base.eventtype.md) | The type of the event (values can be defined by the user) |
|  [userId?](./base.event_2.userid.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A string that can be used to represent the current user performing actions in the application/triggering processes |
